channel.title: Throne of Lies Video
channel.description:
Hey guys, some of you know me, some of you don't. For the past almost year, I've been posting videos for ToS on my channel, but not that Throne of Lies is out, I'm going to be posting 3-4 videos of it per week. I just posted a video, so if you want to check it out, here's the link. Hope you enjoy!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6fpByrBUpwZJwScd1tuneQ/videos
